text: Hontōni anata gata no omo wa arrā de ara reru. Kare wa 6-nichi de ten to ji o tsukuri, sorekara gyokuza ni za shite ora reru. Kare wa hiru no ue ni yoru o ōwa se, yoru ni hiru o awatadashiku aitsuga shime nasa re, mata taiyō, tsuki, Murubushi o, inochi ni fukusa se rareru. Ā, kare koso wa sōzō shi tōgyo sa reru okatade wanai ka. Ban'yū no shu arrā ni shukufuku are
